delinquent.translation[0].definitions[0]: behaving in a way that is illegal or that society does not approve of
delinquent.translation[0].definitions[1]: a delinquent debt, account etc has not been paid on time
delinquent.translation[1].definitions[0]: someone, especially a young person, who breaks the law or behaves in ways their society does not approve of
Deanes writes and lectures about teenage delinquents.
delinquent.translation[2].definitions[0]: an account, debt etc that has not been paid at the right time, or has not been paid at all
Creditor management allows lenders to reduce the risk of delinquent accounts.
